Sorry it took long, I'm going to a university and doing assignments. Artist is smoke kll. This one was requested and I decided not to add the foot wrinkles because they looked ugly imo. I took them off and it looks somewhat better. Anyways enjoy. If you want to make a request, my discord is thegreatj74. You can even find my instagram as well with the same username.

Erwin sight, credits to the original artist, I did NOT make the art, only the sight.

#erwin #gup #girlsundpanzer #girls_und_panzer #garupan #hippoteam #sight #wtdraw

Nonagon Infinity opens the door.

No. 21
Description: A rendition of the Battlefield 4 Rorsch MK-1 Railgun scope altered for use as a tank gunsight.

Bonus Drawing: Album cover of Nonagon Infinity - King Gizzard & the Lizard Wizard. (Thank you dearly, Hakita, creator of ULTRAKILL).

Best Used: For high-top tier tanks with good zoom (4.0x-12.0x) and a powerful, high velocity round.

WTDraw files present inside for the album cover. More instructions available on the READ ME folder.

...and befo...
